com.anji.integration

Class AnjiNetTranscriber

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.anji.integration.AnjiNetTranscriber
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Transcriber<AnjiActivator>, Configurable

    public class AnjiNetTranscriber
extends java.lang.Object
implements Transcriber<AnjiActivator>
    The purpose of this class is to construct a neural net object (AnjiNet) from a chromosome. TranscriberFactory should be used to construct an AnjiNetTranscriber, given a chromosome. getNet() or getPhenotype() returns the resulting network.
    Author:
    Philip Tucker
    See Also:
    AnjiNet

      AnjiActivator transcribe(Chromosome genotype, AnjiActivator substrate)
      Sub-classes must implement this method to convert the genotype to a phenotype, using an existing substrate object to allow performance gains by avoiding destroying and creating large objects or arrays.

      • transcribe

        public AnjiActivator transcribe(Chromosome genotype,
                       AnjiActivator substrate)
                         throws TranscriberException
        Description copied from interface: Transcriber
        Sub-classes must implement this method to convert the genotype to a phenotype, using an existing substrate object to allow performance gains by avoiding destroying and creating large objects or arrays.
        Specified by:
        transcribe in interface Transcriber<AnjiActivator>
        Parameters:
        genotype - chromosome to transcribe
        substrate - An existing phenotype substrate to reuse
        Returns:
        phenotype
        Throws:
        TranscriberException
        See Also:
        Note: this method has been added to conform with the Transcriber interface, but does not use the substrate argument for performance gains.
